mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (email, media_no, review_text, user_rating, discussion_status) VALUES (#{email}, #{mediaNo}, #{reviewText}, #{userRating}, #{discussionStatus})
mapper.select: SELECT u.nickname AS nickname, r.* FROM review r INNER JOIN user u ON r.email = u.email WHERE r.media_no = #{mediaNo} ORDER BY r.review_no desc
